remarks: The opposite of a group sum is the same as the original.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumzoppg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzoppg.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzoppg.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzoppg.o $e |- O = ( oppG ` G ) $.
gsumzoppg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzoppg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzoppg.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzoppg.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzoppg.n $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzoppg $p |- ( ph -> ( O gsum F ) = ( G gsum F ) ) $.
